cor.test(Data$useEM_me_1, Data$useEM_others_1)

# Attitudes
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Data <- Data %>% 
  mutate(Usefulness_4_R = 6 -  Usefulness_4,
         Amusement_4_R  = 6 -  Amusement_4,
         Formality_4_R  = 6 -  Formality_4,
         Vallance_7_R   = 6 -  Vallance_7)

Attitude <- Data %>% 
  select(Usefulness_4_R, Interest_4, Amusement_4_R,
         Ease_4, Formality_4_R, Vallance_7_R) %>% 
  as.matrix()

alpha(Attitude)


Data$Attitudes <- Data %>% 
  select(Usefulness_4_R, Interest_4, Amusement_4_R,
         Ease_4, Formality_4_R, Vallance_7_R) %>%
  rowMeans()

skim(Data$Attitudes)
```
